The above YAML describes a set, or schema, of actions related to ticketing and event management. Each is characterized by a randomized alphanumeric ID and has a skill_description describing the action as well as a set of entities that need to be extracted for an action to be taken, i.e., if a user requests details about an event, an entity of importance is the name of the event the details are being requested for. The task is to take an input from a user and assign the appropriate action to be taken by matching the user input to the skill_description. All entities for the matched skill description should be extracted so that the action can be taken. If an entity value cannot be found, leave it blank. Provide the output as a list of dictionaries in YAML in the following format:
```
- intent_id: <intent_id1> 
  intent_name: <Name>
  slots: 
   - slot1_id: <slot_id1> 
     slot1_value: <slot1_value> 
   - slot2_id: <slot_id2> 
     slot2_value: <slot2_value> 
```
The IDs for entities and and actions should be output, not names.

I have tickets for my husband and I to see Wicked next Wednesday the 27th at Brownstone theatre at 10th and 50th. It is a surprise for our anniversary but I realized that he is working a day shift that day so I need to change them to the evening show instead. I think it is a 9pm. Right now our tickets are for the matinee at 2pm.
